column1: Well actually Dom there were many cases outside U.S. BEFORE 1 week ago Thursday and there was NO deliberate tanking. Once Sanders gained steam and ahole like Dan Niles saw he could short Apple more... and of course Tesla hitting $900... until then #COVID19 was just another flu

BUT just once during this INSANITY where MOST INVESTORS have lost all off 2019 and 2018 and @realDonaldTrump refuses to suspend Tariffs JUST once @CNBC @SquawkCNBC @megtirrell could go over the quasi benign results of #COVID19. https://video.foxbusiness.com/v/6136691473001/ @GreggJarrett @BeckyQuick
